summary:
This mod adds 2x new weapons to the game
Realmshatter Greatsword
Realmshatter Sword

I am still working on the rest of the weapons to create a full weapon pack. But for now enjoy these.
descriptionHtml:
ALSO AVAILABLE ON STEAM

this pack has 6 of the weapons in it so far

finished
Greatsword is craftable in the Daedric perk
1H sword is craftable in the Glass perk (curved blade)
1H sword is craftable in the Glass perk (streight blade)
Dagger is craftable in the Glass perk (curved blade)
Dagger is craftable in the Glass perk (streight blade)

work in progress
Bow is craftable in the Glass perk

up and comming
Axe is craftable in the Daedric perk
Battleaxe is craftable in the Daedric perk
Mace is craftable in the Daedric perk
Warhammer is craftable in the Daedric perk

In concept stage
Flail / ball and chain
Spear / Polearm
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

These weapons are slightly stronger then Daedric weapons

Base Stat comparison....(vanilla)
Daedric Swords, damage 14, crit 7, weight 16, speed 1.000, reach 1.000
Realmshatter Swords, damage 16, crit 8, weight 14, speed 1.000, reach 1.100

Daedric Greatsword, damage 24, crit 12, weight 23, speed 0.700, reach 1.300
Realmshatter Greatsword, damage 25, crit 14, weight 21, speed 0.700, reach 1.500

Daedric Daggers, damage 11, crit 5, weight 6, speed 1.300, reach 0.700
Realmshatter Daggers, damage 13, crit 6, weight 5, speed 1.200, reach 0.800

Daedric Bow, damage 19, crit 9, weight 18.000, speed 0.500
Realmshatter bow, damage 21, crit 10, weight 15.000, speed 0.400
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fixes.....
all texture paths should be correct now
all of them should be craftable as well as upgradeing to legendary
added the 2nd sword version
added two dagger versions that match the swords
added the bow. (still having issues with its bones and animations, I left it in the pack for now so people could see the model, the bow is usable but its screwed up visualy while in use.)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

programs used:
3ds max 11
Adobe Photoshop Elements 10
Coral Paintshop Pro
Nifscope
FO3 Archive tool

please post any feedback here if you find any issues with this mod. And if you love my work please let me know and endorse this if you want to.

I usually broadcast a live stream when im working on my mods if anyone is interested.
I use xsplit with Ustream here is the link to my channel
http://www.ustream.tv/channel/jena-s-3d-graphic-design
author: Jena Angela
